summary: Marque is my attempt at an Imperial male, I think he turned out pretty good, very Resident Evil Damnation Leon-ish.
descriptionHtml:
Just a warning, you must have ApachiiSkyhair main and secondary male hair pack files to run this mod, if you don\'t it will most definitely CTD your game! They were masterfiles for his creation. But in my opinion the hair he has is worth it:) Marque is my imperial follower, his basic stats are 550 for Health, Magicka, and Stamina. Fighting style is Spellsword and he has Fireball and Ice Spike, though I have never seen him use them LoL, he comes with Ebony daggers which he tends to use first. I also supplied him with an Ebony bow but he will need arrows.He is wearing college apprentice destruction robes when you meet him in Falkreath in The Dead Man\'s Drink. He is a marriage option for those romantics out there as well:)

REQUIRED!!!!!!!!!!!   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/68476 ApachiiSkyHair main file
AND..................   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/87237 ApachiiSkyHair Male Hair Pack. You must have BOTH files.                           

Aside from the required ApachiiSkyHair mods there are a few must have mods for this, just for the look to be correct, you should have the following mods...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 BetterMales Beautiful Nudes and Faces, use the Younger Faces Merged with Men by Geonox.
 For the body use the same BetterMales mod FavoredSoulMeshes body of your choosing.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13076 Cute Eyes 115X Makes the iris in the eye bigger to escape the tiny eye look.

***************************** The Armor In the Pictures Above is Seadog Armor*******************************
                                     From the Immersive Armor mod by Hothtrooper44:)
[URL=http://imgur.com/BgFMX][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BgFMX.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Installation: NMM recommended.

Manual, put the Marque.ESP file in your skyrim/data file. The textures and meshes files drop into the Skyrim/Data file in
textures and meshes. Hopefully you know the drill:) Open the Nexus Mod Manager to make sure the plugin is active and if you
 are running UFO make sure Marque plugin is after UFO in the load order.


Uninstallation: NMM delete Marque Follower Mod.
Manual, Delete Marque.esp file from Skyrim/Data file. Delete Alerik.esp
 in Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint file. Delete Marque.esp from your
 Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom file. Win.

If you have any questions or concerns let me know:)
author: SerecenHwke
